docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. State Department released its annual report on human rights around the world on Friday but the release was overshadowed by criticism that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson gave the report little of the traditional attention or fanfare.

headline.print_headline: U.S. State Department Criticized Over Quiet Release of Human Rights Report
headline.main: U.S. State Department Criticized Over Quiet Release of Human Rights Report

docs.snippet: The U.S. State Department released its annual report on human rights around the world on Friday but the release was overshadowed by criticism that Secretary of State Rex Tillerson gave the report little of the traditional attention or fanfare....

docs.lead_paragraph: RB Leipzig came from a goal down and led 2-1 at Augsburg on Friday before conceding a second-half equaliser to draw 2-2 and lose ground in the Bundesliga title race.

docs.lead_paragraph: Seven-times grand slam winner Venus Williams, fresh off an inspirational run to the Australian Open finals at age 36, sees no end in sight on the tennis court, even envisioning another Olympics alongside her sister Serena.

docs.lead_paragraph: Officials in Assam said the ancient liturgical language of Hindu priests would now be mandatory in the upper grades of all public high schools.
